desc: 確率で被ダメージを５０％軽減＆被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生・ＢＢゲージを増加・確率でＨＰをかなり回復＆確率で被ダメージの２０％を相手に反射する

dictionary.lore: Armor discovered at a small, ancient shrine in Ishgria. It encapsulates divine power inside a sinister exterior, and is believed to have the power to place mighty curses upon opponents who attack its wearer even as it protects them. It is said that the demons of ancient times produced countless demonic armaments, and created it as an experiment to combine their own dark powers with the divine powers of disciples. However, the specifics of this remain unknown.

name: 凶魔天装ゲオラルド

materials.name: 神王装グラン・ローヌ
